verses.kjv: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;
verses.ct: I solemnly urge you in the presence of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ, who will judge the living and the dead when he appears to establish his kingdom:

verses.kjv: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.
verses.ct: Proclaim the message. Be ready at all times, whether it's convenient or not. Correct, warn, and encourage people with complete patience and careful teaching.

verses.kjv: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;
verses.ct: Because a time is coming when people won't put up with solid teaching. Instead, they'll surround themselves with teachers who tell them whatever they want to hear, following their own desires.

verses.kjv: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
verses.ct: They will stop listening to the truth and wander off into myths.

verses.kjv: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.
verses.ct: But you — stay alert in every situation, endure hardship, carry out the work of sharing the good news, and fully complete your ministry.

verses.kjv: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.
verses.ct: As for me, my life is already being poured out like an offering, and the time for me to leave this world has arrived.

verses.kjv: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
verses.ct: I have fought the good fight, I have completed the race, I have kept the faith.

verses.kjv: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
verses.ct: From now on, a crown of righteousness is waiting for me, which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give to me on that day — and not only to me, but also to everyone who has longed for his return.

verses.kjv: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:
verses.ct: Do your best to get here to me quickly.

verses.kjv: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.
verses.ct: Demas has abandoned me because he fell in love with this present world, and he has gone to Thessalonica. Crescens went to Galatia, and Titus to Dalmatia.

verses.kjv: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.
verses.ct: Only Luke is still with me. Pick up Mark and bring him along when you come, because he is very helpful to me in the ministry.

verses.kjv: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.
verses.ct: I sent Tychicus to Ephesus.

verses.kjv: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.
verses.ct: When you come, bring the cloak I left with Carpus in Troas, along with the books — especially the parchments.

verses.kjv: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:
verses.ct: Alexander the metalworker caused me a great deal of harm. The Lord will repay him for what he has done.

verses.kjv: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.
verses.ct: You should watch out for him too, because he fiercely opposed our message.

verses.kjv: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.
verses.ct: At my first defense in court, no one came to support me — everyone deserted me. I pray that God won't hold it against them.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
verses.ct: But the Lord stood by my side and gave me strength, so that through me the full message could be proclaimed and all the Gentiles could hear it. And I was rescued from the lion's mouth.

verses.kjv: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: The Lord will rescue me from every evil attack and bring me safely into his heavenly kingdom. To him be glory forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.
verses.ct: Give my greetings to Prisca and Aquila, and to the household of Onesiphorus.

verses.kjv: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.
verses.ct: Erastus stayed in Corinth, and I left Trophimus in Miletum because he was sick.

verses.kjv: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.
verses.ct: Do your best to get here before winter. Eubulus sends you greetings, and so do Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers and sisters.

verses.kjv: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
verses.ct: The Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Grace be with you all. Amen.
